sentences.english: The children had glowing cheeks after race.

sentences.english: Then I rake my arm across the drainboard and send the dishes to the floor.

sentences.english: Mr. Qiao Kai Dong is a common PA attendant of Sheraton Dongguan Hotel.

sentences.english: And chances are, you ended up forgetting all about it.
sentences.chinese: 而很可能的，你最終通通都忘掉了。

sentences.english: Bright red, like a string of lanterns, pretty great.
sentences.chinese: 紅通通的，像一串串燈籠，好看極了。

sentences.english: Mom bought me many big red apples. They are my favorite.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽買了許多紅通通的大蘋果，我特別愛喫。

sentences.english: He had a red nose that looked like a cherry.

sentences.english: They will all be forgotten in fifty years anyway.

sentences.english: They stole every mortal thing in the house.

sentences.english: You could tell from his red face that he realized he was wrong.

sentences.english: Just an average middleclass guy who likes chinese women.

sentences.english: Please open the window to air the room.

sentences.chinese: 把你所有的文件夾和項目通通都複製到你的次要硬盤。
